item.title: Abitur
item.description: This is a collection of resources I created while preparing for my Abitur exams in 2022. All information provided here is given without any guarantee! Mathematics (intensive course) Link to heading You can find a script here. Physics (intensive course) Link to heading You can find a script here. German Link to heading To be completed. Files are available in /abitur/german/ Social Sciences Link to heading You can find a script here.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Simon Sure, I’m 19 years old and currently located in Zurich, Switzerland. I am originally from Kempen, Germany and moved for my Computer Science Bachelor studies to Switzerland. I enjoy working intensively on projects but still focus mostly on my studies @ETHZurich. Besides, I join events from institutions and companies whenever possible. To balance all those activities, I go running regularly and currently train for marathons. Since the semester which started in September 2023, I am teaching assistant for Discrete Mathematics @ETHZurich.

item.title: ETHZ
item.description: This prage provides an overview of study materials, which I create(d) during my studies. I do not take responsibility for correctness or completeness. If you have any questions or remarks, do not hesitate to send me a message. You can find my notes from during each semester up to including the second semester here. You can find more polished summaries and resources listed below for download. 2nd semester Link to heading Parallel Programming Essentials Algorithms and Probability Essentials 1st semester Link to heading Algorithms and Data Structures Essentials Discrete Mathematics Cheat Sheet Linear Algebra cheat Sheet

item.title: Projects
item.description: This showcases some of the projects I have worked on in recent years. If you have any questions or want to learn more, please reach out. Currently, I am working on FLIZAR, an AI-powered exam prepration tool for students and lectureres. Also, I participate in and am always on the lookout for Hackathons (and other events). If you can recommand any hackathon or event, please let me know. FLIZAR Link to heading FLIZAR originated with the Digital Seeds ideathon.
